choose_your_preferred: Choose your preferred online customer service contact method
fonterra_cooperative_group_co: Fonterra Cooperative Group Co., Ltd., referred to as Fonterra, is a multinational dairy cooperative in New Zealand run by about 10,500 local farmers. The company now accounts for about 30% of global dairy exports and has revenue of more than NZ$17.2 billion, making it New Zealand's largest company.
as_one_of_the_world: As one of the world's largest dairy export and milk processing companies, Fonterra is favored by many world food companies. Its own dairy brands are in the markets of New Zealand, Australia, Asia, Africa, the Middle East and Latin America. Also highly sought after.
fontera_wants_argiculture: Fonterra wants agriculture in Aotearoa, New Zealand, to be passed down from generation to generation, which is why Fonterra is committed to farming sustainably on pasture.
fontera_farms_according: Fonterra farms according to the laws of nature. Because of this, the carbon footprint of Fonterra's New Zealand pastures is one-third of the world average. Fonterra hopes to continue to improve emissions efficiency and make the environment more sustainable. To do this, Fonterra produces low carbon, protects nature and takes a regenerative approach.
fonterra_belives_food: Fonterra believes food and nutrition are critical to sustaining life today and allowing future generations to thrive. That's why Fonterra pays great attention to every drop of milk, from start to finish. It's dedication and care that enables Fonterra to produce safe and high-quality dairy products, while dairy knowledge and innovation mean Fonterra can do things with milk that improve people's lives.
fonterra_must_work_together: Fonterra must work together, forge ahead, make necessary changes, and use the cryptocurrency platform to promote the promotion of Fonterra products and benefit recommenders from around the world. Let’s explore the profits and development of cryptocurrency together!

how_to_store_value_on_the_fonterra_platf: How to store value on the Fonterra platform
reacharge_digital_currency_at_fontera: Recharge digital currency at Fonterra. If you already own digital currency assets, you can transfer the digital assets to your LHKAIFA account through the store function or withdrawal function of the trading platform or wallet where you hold digital assets.
digital_assets_are_stored_in_value_addre: Digital assets are stored in value through addresses. You only need to copy the address of the corresponding currency on the Binance AI [Stored Value] page to a platform with digital assets, perform transfer operations, and then recharge your digital assets to your Binance AI account. The specific steps are as follows (if you have any questions during the recharge process, you can directly contact customer service staff for answers)
register_a_fontera_account: 1. Register a Fonterra account. After logging in, the [Stored Value] entry will be displayed on the home page. Only TRC-20 and ERC-20 are supported. It is recommended that new users deposit USDT (a stable currency anchored to the US dollar, 1 US dollar = 1 USDT) and use the TRC20 address. Transfers are fast and fees are relatively cheap.
copy_the_fonterra_address: 2. Copy the Fonterra address, fill in the withdrawal address field of the exchange or wallet that can withdraw coins, fill in the withdrawal amount, wait for the transfer to be confirmed on the chain (the confirmation process takes about 0~10 minutes), and then you can deposit to Binance AI account.
during_the_deposit_process: 1. During the deposit process, you need to confirm the correctness of the currency, chain and address. If you deposit the wrong amount, you may not get it back.
if_you_are_not_sure_weather_the_recharge: 2. If you are not sure whether the recharge operation is correct, you can contact customer service or make a small transfer. After confirming that the operation process is correct, proceed with large-amount transfers.
during_the_deposit_process_3: 3. During the deposit process, there may sometimes be congestion on the chain, which may take more than 10 minutes. This is normal, please be patient.
since_the_fonterra_robot_is_based: 4. Since the Fonterra robot is based on USDT (requires USDT activation), among the four addresses, the main transfers are concentrated in TRC20. It is recommended that novices who want to store LHKAIFA value transfer USDT to Fonterra through the TRC20 chain.
how_to_withdraw_coins_on_fonterra: 3. How to withdraw coins on Fonterra
if_you_want_to_withdraw_the_digital_asse: If you want to withdraw the digital assets in your Fonterra account to other platform accounts or your digital wallet, you can quickly withdraw the digital assets through the [Withdrawal] function. Withdraw digital assets through address.
before_withdrawing_coins: Before withdrawing coins, you need to find the deposit address on the corresponding coin withdrawal platform, copy the address to the address on the Fonterra platform's coin withdrawal page, and withdraw your digital assets to the account on the corresponding platform. The specific steps are as follows:
select_the_address_of_the_corresponding: 1. Select the address of the corresponding chain in the wallet or exchange where the currency is stored, and copy the chain.
open_the_fonterra_withrawal_page: 2. Open the Fonterra withdrawal page, choose the corresponding currency and the chain of the corresponding stored value wallet or exchange.
fill_in_the_copied_link_address: 3. Fill in the copied link address into the Fonterra address column. After confirming that the chain and address are correct, choose OK to withdraw coins (confirm that you can withdraw coins when withdrawing coins).
coin_withdrawal_example: Coin withdrawal example: Withdraw coins to the wallet, first choose the wallet to recharge, then choose the currency USDT, choose the TRC20 chain, and copy the wallet address. Open Fonterra, enter the withdrawal page, choose USDT, choose the TRC20 chain, fill in the Fonterra address copied from the wallet, choose the withdrawal amount, and submit the withdrawal.
notes_on_withdrawing_coins: Notes on withdrawing coins: During the process of withdrawing coins, you need to confirm the correctness of the currency, chain and address. If the coins are withdrawn to the wrong address or chain, please confirm that the coins have been uploaded to the chain. You can only contact the customer service of the store to solve the problem. Fonterra cannot solve this problem because the coins are already in the depositor's wallet. If you are not sure whether the currency withdrawal operation process is correct, you can withdraw a small amount of coins first, and then continue with large transfers after confirming that the operation process is correct.
fonterraAI_is_an_intelligent_trading_rob: FonterraAI is an intelligent trading robot that can learn and evolve on its own. It has its own consciousness.
the_aiRobot_ensures_that_members: The AIrobot ensures that members can obtain a corresponding level of income through smart investment every day! Because it requires a large amount of trading volume to continuously evolve itself.

company_content_1: We connect people and build communities, creating economic opportunity for all.
company_content_2: At Nike, we create ways to connect millions of sellers and buyers in more than 190 marketplaces around the world. Our technology empowers our customers and gives everyone the opportunity to grow and develop - no matter who they are or where they are in the world. The ripple effects of our work create waves of change for our customers, our companies, our communities and our planet.
